participant_abstract.sent: We present our beautiful prototypes and discuss the cost, as well as the marketing issues.
We rated our prototypes using the market expert criterion.

participant_actions.sent: Find the best tradeoff between the shape / technology and the production complexity.

participant_decisions.sent: Decision has been made to produce fruit-shaped remote control, with spongy feeling, and not much technology inside (cheaper).
Decision has been based upon a recent market study presented by the market expert.
[PROBLEMS / ISSUE] How to produce the spongy effect, which fruit shape to use ?
Are the speech recognizer and the LCD display very useful (compared to production costs).
